name: Palms
description:
This is the game I developed for the global Game jam 2022 :D it was inspired by Rock, Paper, Scissors.

I did everything except for the air sound effect, the background and the tiles. The background and tiles are from Free Platformer 16x16 + Background by oisougabo (itch.io) please check their artist profile :). The air sound effect was taken from here: Wind in Air Sound Effect - YouTube.

Thank you so much for playing my game! :)
